content: Aug 10 Invitation Homes Inc said on Thursday it would buy Starwood Waypoint Homes in an all-stock deal that would create a $11 billion U.S. single-family rental company.
name: Invitation Homes Inc
title: Blackstone's Invitation Homes to buy Starwood Waypoint

content: Feb 1 Shares of Invitation Homes Inc  which is backed by private equity firm Blackstone Group  rose as much as 1.6 percent in their market debut on Wednesday  valuing the largest U.S. home rental company at about $6.14 billion.
name: Invitation Homes Inc
title: Invitation Homes rises in IPO debut

content: * Invitation Homes Inc shares open at $20.10 in debut  above IPO price of $20.00 per share  Further company coverage:

title: BRIEF-Invitation Homes shares open at $20.10 in debut
